title: Who sings that song The power of love? - Quora

response.answer_text: Songs "(You Got) The Power of Love", by The Everly Brothers (1966)"The Power of Love" (Charley Pride song) (1984)"The Power of Love" (Jennifer Rush song) (1984)"The Power of Love" (Frankie Goes to Hollywood song) (1984)"The Power of Love" (Huey Lewis and the News song) (1985)"Power of Love" (Deee-Lite song) (1990)"Power of Love", by Judy and Mary (1993)"The Power of Love", a composition by Percy Grainger"Power of Love/Love Power", by Luther Vandross"The Power of Love", by 10cc from Ten Out of 10"The Power of Love", by Corona"The Power of Love", by Ray Conniff"Power of Love" (Joe Simon song)"Power of Love", by Mahavishnu Orchestra, the opening track from their album Apocalypse"Power of Love", by Gary Wright from The Dream Weaver

Well In the 80s there were a few songs with the title ‘The Power of Love’. These were written by the following artists: Frankie Goes To Hollywood Jennifer Rush (the one that Celine Dion covered in the 90s) Luther Vandross Huey Lewis and the News Of these I’d say the one by Huey Lewis is the most famous globally as it was also used in the iconic 80s movie Back to The Future. Edit: Luther Vandross’ Power of Love was actually released in 1991 but Frankie’s and Jeniffer Rush’s songs were released in ‘84 and Huey Lewis’ in ‘85
